sentences.en: A review the situation and progress of the Flame - retardant technology.
sentences.cn: 介绍了阻燃剂及其阻燃机理.综述阻燃技术的现状和发展趋势.

sentences.en: Flame - retardant asphalts with different flame - retardant ( H , L , W ) were prepared.
sentences.cn: 选用三种阻燃剂 分别制备 了不同的阻燃沥青.

sentences.en: Glass reinforced high performance polyamide resin, with a non - halogenated flame retardant.
sentences.cn: %玻璃纤维增强高性能聚酰胺树脂, 以 非 卤化阻燃剂.

sentences.en: It has good flame - retardant property, high temperature stability and low - temperature anti - cracking property.
sentences.cn: 具有良好的阻燃性能 、 高温稳定性和低温 抗 裂性能.

sentences.en: Its film has special performances in flame - retardant and electronic - conduction.
sentences.cn: 漆膜具有 长期 稳定的导静电性及阻燃性.

sentences.en: Its film has special performances in flame - retardant, heat - resistant, electronic - conduction.
sentences.cn: 本品漆膜具有遇火不燃 、 耐热和漆膜全寿命导静电能力.

sentences.en: Joined the anti - static agent and flame retardant, the more their outstanding performance.
sentences.cn: 加入 防 静电剂和阻燃剂后, 更显其卓越的性能.

sentences.en: Novelty intumescent flame retardant ( IFR ) was made from phosphoric acid, pentaerythritol and melamine.
sentences.cn: 使用磷酸 、 季戊四醇、三聚氰胺合成了一种膨胀型阻燃剂.

sentences.en: Our Products -- antimagnetic filtering, fire retardant, insulation, anti - ultraviolet, anti - corrosion .
sentences.cn: 我们的产品 ----- 防磁滤波, 防火阻燃, 绝缘, 抗 紫外线, 防腐蚀.

sentences.en: Tetrabromobisphenol A - di ( o - chloro benzyl ) ether is a novel efficient flame retardant.
sentences.cn: 四溴双酚A - 双 ( 邻氯苄基 ) 醚是一种新型高效阻燃剂.

sentences.en: The application examples of the flame retardant were given.
sentences.cn: 文中还列举了该阻燃剂的应用.

sentences.en: The cable bridge rack has simple installation and good fire - proof flame - retardant effect.
sentences.cn: 该电缆桥架安装简单,防火阻燃效果又好.

sentences.en: The chloroprene rubber sheath is heat and oil resistant and flame retardant.
sentences.cn: 氯丁橡胶混合物护套具有耐热、耐油和不延然性能.

sentences.en: The ideal conditions of flame retardant finishing was determined.
sentences.cn: 最终确定了阻燃整理的理想工艺条件.

sentences.en: There are a variety of synthetic LaTeX , flame retardant, etc.
sentences.cn: 合成物则有各种合成乳胶 、 聚乙烯醇等.

words.tran_cn: 智力迟钝的；发展迟缓的

phrases.tran_cn: 阻燃剂；防火剂；防火材料

trans.tran_en: a substance that reduces the rate of a chemical reaction
